channel.title: Posts on FAU AI in Medicine
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on FAU AI in Medicine

item.title: FDA Guidelines for AI in Medicine
item.description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) now pervades almost every application and website we use. It’s also rapidly entering the healthcare space. There’s a common understanding that government regulation plays catch-up with innovation. This is especially true when it comes to software. In radiology, there’s a plethora of papers on detecting lesions in mammograms [1], brains [2], and chest x-rays [3], yet many advances in AI research are miles away from real-world use in the clinic.
